oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Businesses on the East Side of Public Square, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of several businesses located on Public Square East, c.1950s. Neely-Harwell and Co. and Every Beasley dry goods store are prominent. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); Neely-Harwell and Company (Nashville, Tenn.); Everett Beasley Dry Goods (Nashville, Tenn.);
